mapper.insert: insert into commodity( commodityName, commodityShopId, commodityNumber, commodityPrice, commodityImg, commodityMenuId )values (#{commodityName},#{commodityShopId},#{commodityNumber},#{commodityPrice},#{commodityImg},#{commodityMenuId})

INSERT INTO shop ( shopName, shopImg, shopSellerId, shopAddress, shopStartPrice, shopSendPrice ) VALUES( #{shopName}, #{shopImg}, #{shopSellerId}, #{shopAddress}, #{shopStartPrice}, #{shopSendPrice} )

INSERT INTO COMMENT ( shopId, orderId, commentImg, commentInfo, accountName, commentTime, commentScore, shopReply, shopReplyTime ) VALUES ( #{shopId},#{orderId},#{commentImg},#{commentInfo},#{accountName},#{commentTime},#{commentScore},#{shopReply},#{shopReplyTime})
mapper.update: update commodity set commodityName = #{commodityName}, commodityShopId = #{commodityShopId} , commodityNumber = #{commodityNumber}, commodityPrice =#{commodityPrice} , commodityImg = #{commodityImg} , commodityMenuId = #{commodityMenuId} where commodityId = #{commodityId}

update shop set shopName = #{shopName}, shopImg =#{shopImg}, shopSellerId = #{shopSellerId}, shopAddress = #{shopAddress}, shopStartPrice = #{shopStartPrice}, shopSendPrice =#{shopSendPrice}, shopOpenTime =#{shopOpenTime}, shopCloseTime = #{shopCloseTime}, shopTypeId = #{shopTypeId}, shopInfo = #{shopInfo} WHERE shopSellerId = #{shopSellerId}
mapper.delete: delete from buyerLikeShop where buyerAccount = #{buyerAccount} and shopId = #{shopId}
mapper.select: SELECT shopId, shopName, shopImg, shopSellerId, shopAddress, shopStartPrice, shopSendPrice, shopSalesVolume, shopScore FROM shop

SELECT shop.shopId, shop.shopName, shop.shopImg, shop.shopSellerId, shop.shopAddress, shop.shopStartPrice, shop.shopSendPrice, shop.shopSalesVolume, shop.shopScore, shop.shopInfo, commodity.commodityId, commodity.commodityName, commodity.commodityNumber, commodity.commodityPrice, commodity.commodityImg, commodity.commodityShopId, commodity.commodityMenuId, shopmenu.shopMenuId, shopmenu.shopMenuName FROM shop INNER JOIN commodity ON shop.shopId = commodity.commodityShopId INNER JOIN shopmenu ON commodity.commodityMenuId = shopmenu.shopMenuId WHERE shopId =#{shopId}
SELECT shopId, shopName, shopImg, shopSellerId, shopAddress, shopStartPrice, shopSendPrice, shopSalesVolume, shopScore FROM shop WHERE shopName LIKE "%" #{shopName}"%"

SELECT commodityId, commodityName, commodityNumber, commodityPrice, commodityImg, commodityShopId, commodityMenuId, shopMenuName, shopName FROM commodity LEFT JOIN shopmenu ON commodityMenuId = shopMenuId LEFT JOIN shop ON commodityShopId = shopId
where commodityShopId = #{commodityShopId}
SELECT commodityId, commodityName, commodityNumber, commodityPrice, commodityImg, commodityShopId, commodityMenuId FROM commodity where commodityId = #{commodityId}
SELECT shopName from shop WHERE shopId = #{shopId}
SELECT shopName,shopId from shop WHERE shopSellerId = #{sellerId}
SELECT shopId, shopName, shopImg, shopSellerId, shopAddress, shopStartPrice, shopSendPrice, shopTypeId, shopInfo, shopOpenTime, shopCloseTime FROM shop WHERE shopSellerId = #{accountUserId}
SELECT shopId, shopName, shopImg, shopSellerId, shopAddress, shopStartPrice, shopSendPrice, shopSalesVolume, shopScore FROM shop WHERE shopTypeId = #{shopTypeId}
select shopId from buyerLikeShop where buyerAccount = #{buyerAccount}

SELECT shop.shopName, shop.shopId, shop.shopImg, shop.shopScore, shop.shopSendPrice, shop.shopStartPrice, shop.shopSalesVolume FROM shop JOIN buyerlikeshop ON shop.shopId = buyerlikeshop.shopId WHERE buyerlikeshop.buyerAccount = #{buyerAccount}

SELECT shop.shopName, shop.shopOpenTime, shoptype.shopType, shop.shopAddress, shop.shopCloseTime, seller.sellerTel FROM shop JOIN seller ON shop.shopSellerId = seller.sellerId JOIN shoptype ON shoptype.shopTypeId = shop.shopTypeId WHERE shop.shopId = #{shopId}

SELECT `comment`.shopId, `comment`.orderId, `comment`.commentImg, `comment`.commentInfo, `comment`.accountName, `comment`.commentTime, `comment`.commentScore, `comment`.shopReply, `comment`.shopReplyTime, account.wxName, account.wxImage FROM `comment` LEFT JOIN account ON `comment`.accountName = account.accountName WHERE `comment`.shopId = #{shopId}
